scripts.forever: forever stopall & forever start -o forever_out.log -e forever_err.log -a bin/www
scripts.forever-sit: forever stopall & cross-env NODE_ENV=sit forever start -o forever_out.log -e forever_err.log -a bin/www
scripts.forever-pre: forever stopall & cross-env NODE_ENV=pre forever start -o forever_out.log -e forever_err.log -a bin/www
scripts.forever-prd: forever stopall & cross-env NODE_ENV=prd forever start -o forever_out.log -e forever_err.log -a bin/www
